title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Search for references to this field5.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, observe that the first match is not selected.
EB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match should be selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
 1. Ensure that JDK1.3.1 is set as the default JRE (and that you have source `rt.jar`). 
 2. Open `java.io.File`. 
 3. Select the field 'tmpFir'. 
 4. Perform a search for references to this field. 
 5. Double-click on the search result.
